Title: Wpf localization without compile
Description: Localization without recompiling, use it to localize your app. (Including xaml support).
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This was requirment in one of my projects and I'm uploading the source for you all.
This is localization system (very simple) to read strings from resx file without needing to recompile at any resources change. It's allow you to add any resx file (with culture specified name like fr-FR) and localize your app by anyone who can translate. (You don't need programmer to translate your app).

This project includes the Langauge container itself, and markup extension to use it in xaml apps.
